tool_description: This API returns cryptocurrency ICO from coinmarketcap, foundico, icohotlist and much more... Get All the New Releases in one place!
name: Crypto ICO AND NFT
title: Crypto ICO AND NFT

api_list.name: Get All UpComing NFT
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a all Upcoming NFT.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-ico-and-nft.p.rapidapi.com/upcomingnft"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-ico-and-nft.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get ICO from one source
api_list.description:
This endpoint returns a a ICO from only one source.

Parameters:
-> siteId ( we support: icohotlist, coinmarketcap, foundico)
